name: Isolation - A Text Adventure
description:
Isolation - a Text Adventure is build for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4.

The basic controls:

@place - type "go to place" to go there
#thing - type "use thing" to use it
+thing - type "take thing" to take it
!!thing - type "attack thing" to attack it/him/her
>thing - type "connect to thing" to connect to it

type "inventory" to look at the inventory
type "close" to leave the inventory
type "save" to save your progress (not implemented yet)
type "exit" to end the game

Current version: 0.0.3 - Prototypish Alpha

Coming soon: more more story, saving, inventory, better English grammar (I am not a native speaker)
